articles.title: Google just made a key concession to smaller search rivals in Europe - CNBC
articles.description: Google said it will stop charging a fee for search engines to appear in a list of default search engines on Android in Europe.
articles.content:
LONDON Google said Tuesday that it will stop charging a fee for search engines to appear on a list of default search engines on Android that's exclusive to European users.
